text:
QUEEN OF BATTLE
SERIES TWO
14- -PACK MULES OF THE SKY
helicopters are playing an ever-increasing role in the mobility
of the Army, carrying everything from troops to weapons to blood.
15- -THE DEFENSE OF THE NATION
like a football team, each member of the Army team is assigned
both an offensive and defensive role
16- ADVANCED NONCOMMISSIONED OFFICER SCHOOL
even the “old-dogs” of the Army must learn new tricks. For
this, the Army’s NCO’s go to school
17- -THE RANGERS
the toughest fighting men in the world are the Rangers. This
is the story of their training and what it means to be a Ranger
18- -THE HOME OF THE RIFLE
Ft Benning is the home of the infantry. And whether in training or
in combat, the infantryman is never without his rifle
19- -THE ARMY’S PROVIDERS
the Quartermaster Corps is responsible for insuring the truth of
the adjectives best fed, best equiped and best clothed Army in the World
20- -THE 29TH--THE ARMY’S ACTORS
Ft Benning’s 29th Infantry demonstrates combat techniques to
the Army’s future leaders attending the Infantry School
21- -NORTH ATLANTIC TREATY ORGANIZATION
NATO spells security in Europe through teamwork. A close-up
view of how “mutual defense” is organized and coordinated
22- -HISTORY OF FORT BENNING
a telegram sent from a World War I combat by General Pershing
sparked the beginning of Fort Benning’s exciting story
23- -THE WOMEN’S ARMY CORPS
WAC’S carry a heavy load of noncombat soldier duties, enjoy
enriching and satisfying careers, and add to the national security
24- -THE CANINE CORPS
man’s best friend has played important combat roles throughout
military history. They perform the impossible in team with the GI
25- -THE CHAIN OF COMMAND
efficiency in accomplishing the Army mission depends on each link in
the chain of command. The Army runs smoothly with its “chain” drive
26- ARTILLERY
the world’s finest weapons, plus men who know and excel in their
jobs, give the infantry an indispensable supporting ally
